name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life. Perfect for music lovers and professionals who need crystal-clear audio quality.

name: Smart Watch
description: Feature-rich smartwatch with fitness tracking, heart rate monitor, and smartphone connectivity. Stay connected and track your health on the go.

name: Laptop Stand
description: Ergonomic aluminum laptop stand that improves posture and workspace organization. Adjustable height for maximum comfort.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB backlit mechanical keyboard with customizable keys and premium switches. Experience the satisfying click with every keystroke.

name: USB-C Hub
description: Multi-port USB-C hub with HDMI, USB 3.0, and SD card reader support. Expand your connectivity options instantly.

name: Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with precision tracking and long battery life. Comfortable design for extended use.

name: Wireless Speaker
description: Premium portable wireless speaker with 360-degree sound, waterproof design, and 20-hour battery life. Perfect for parties and outdoor adventures.

name: Premium Cotton Underwear
description: Comfortable and breathable cotton underwear with soft elastic waistband. Available in multiple sizes and colors. Perfect for everyday wear with premium quality fabric.
